Coming from Half-Life 2 to this game and man, its 24 years of age shows, I don't mind the graphics, it is more of getting stuck on the world, unresponsive controls, clunkyness, etc, I have had to reload a save TWENTY TIMES because I was stuck in a wall or the floor. Now I understand, it is a VERY VERY VERY old game, but man who would think this game that feels foreign would bloom into the creators of Steam, L4D, etc...  

I personally can't recommend this game, due to how it has aged over the years, but if you want to experience Half-Life 1 and NOT the fan made Black mesa remake for the game, try it out, it definitely changed the FPS genre in it's day. But yeah the gun play is fun, but man getting stuck, clunkyness, and having unresponsive controls due to collision i.e jumping, being flung in a weird direction, or getting stuck on stuff. AND DO NOT GET ME STARTED ON XEN. I personally would recommend either trying out the Remake for the game by fans, or try Half Life 2 Instead. 

Overall 5/10

This game is fucking amazing, not only the gameplay and shooting, but the puzzles are just on point, not too hard to feel like you are on a math competition but not too easy to make going through the game super fast, would recommend everyone this game, just be ready for some REALLY CRUEL HITSCANNERS. Also the boss is a giant fetus and its so bad that Quake bosses are good now but thats really the only disappointing part of the game, especially the mysterious ending and the credits music which i immeadietly jumped out of my chair and started dancing, i love this game.

The first game in the Half-Life series, this game in great. The classic combat, puzzles and platforming as well as the story make for a very good start for the series. I highly recommend this version if you're starting out, but if you're coming from Half-Life 2, you could either play this version or Black Mesa, do be aware that in Black Mesa some maps and puzzles are very different from the original. Overall, Good Game. Sure the graphics and GoldSRC it's self are a bit dated but, it kinda adds to the appeal for me.

A classic game, fast paced and constantly moving with great puzzles and a simple but interesting storyline. The latter half of the game does slow down a bit when compared to the beginning but it's overall a fun experience and should be played by any PC gamer at least once due to how foundational it was.
kinda cool bro
Very Exciting Trilling adventure with good mechanics for its age, great story and very enjoyable.

Half-Life - is a first game in my life, which meeted me with shooter games. Thanks to its design, mechanics and story, this game can be played forever. Personally, I also like the soundtrack of this game - each melody corresponds to the chapter in which it sounds. Because of this, this game is one of my favorites. Yes, as in all games - there are bugs here, but this will not affect my attitude to this game in any way. Thank you Valve for Half-Life!
the sound design in this game is insane

Absolute pleasure to play! I can't believe I waited almost twenty-five years to finally buy and play this title. This was a well constructed and well thought out FPS. The story is pretty good, the controls are great. I'm definitely looking forward to subsequent titles and trying out other games from Valve.
worst game ive ever played !!

It's buggy as all heck, but the load and save feature works great, so just save a lot. I'd say there are many times you'll die through no fault of your own, so don't feel bad for save scumming. The game has a lot of variety of stuff you'll be doing, riding trains, elevators, platforming, scratching your head where to go next and so on, thankfully the internet became easier to search since release. I am glad I got around to playing this. Thanks covid. I want to play Alyx one day... But I have it spoiled from let's plays and don't have extra funds laying around to throw at VR anyway. Maybe we'll get something with a three at the end till then.

Half Life, the game which apparently did many things. I had a fun time playing half life. I played through the whole game on medium back in december 2020, and now it is march 2022 when I am writing the review. Considering all the new advancements in technology this game does not hold up the best. But regardless of that this game was really fun to mess about in. A solid 8/10. For its time a 10/10

Если честно, то мне не зашло…
Поиграл я и наскучило настолько что аж писец…
1) Однотипные уровни
2) Тупые нпс
3) Баги с прорисовкой
4) Стрельба в этой игре чувствуется с трудом, а этот дурацкий автоприцеп ужасно всё портит…
5) Не чувствуется сюжет вообще
6) В некоторых случаях просто наитупейшая загрузка при переходе из одной двери в помещение и наоборот, и так раз за разом…
Это - всё что мне не понравилось…

Положительная сторона:
1) Милые жо#о-псинки
2) Угарная озвучка зомби (ох е#ать)
3) Свисающие с потолка сосиски :3
4) Куча враждебных нпс, которые будут иметь вас целыми группами…

Вобщем в 2021-22 году такое себе удовольствие…
Не рекомендую…
Лучше купите вторую халву и забейте на сюжет, ведь как я и говорил ранее - он тут не чувствуется…

Je viens tout juste de finir le jeu, franchement c'est un bon petit jeu très emblématique avec un gameplay innovant pour l'époque, mais je trouve quand même que chaque niveau est assez redondant, on fait plus ou moins toujours la même chose en passant d'une salle à l'autre.

J'ai joué au jeu en mode "Hard" est comment vous dire que j'en ai chié, j'ai plutôt toujours été bon sur les FPS mais franchement c'est chaud, on est constamment à 20 HP, presque zéro munitions, les ennemis nous tue en deux balles, je sais que c'est censé être difficile, mais la c'est quand même abusé je trouve.

Même si j'ai galéré, ça reste un super jeu mythique avec une bonne histoire etc... ;) il me reste plus qu'à faire les DLC "Opposing Force" & "Blue Shift"

You play as mute scientist who dooms all of humanity by going to work. Your workplace gets overrun by aliens and you need to escape. The military comes in, but fucks off because they weren't prepared unlike you. Then you go to a weird alien world to kill a giant fetus. The end. 10/10 good game

I think it's actually aged pretty well. I never would've thought that a nearly 30 year old game could play like a modern shooter, yet here it does. More a testament to how influential and foundational this game was to its genre.
I hope old graphics don't bother you, because this is a classic.

Back then this probably was incredible game and mind blowing, but today standards this is not a great game. At least for people like me, who enjoys story more explained by characters, notes etc and a little bit more guided, but still keeps player thinking by themselves. Like seriously I don't know or understand what the f happened in this game. Game starts with some explosions and hell has landed. That's it. Controlling Freeman is HARD in some chapters and some levels are so hard/confusing so you need to watch walkthrough. But still, I think every self-respecting player should complete this game.
